entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` TEXT NOT NULL, `pubkey` TEXT NOT NULL, `createdAt` INTEGER NOT NULL, `kind` INTEGER NOT NULL, `content` TEXT NOT NULL, `sig` TEXT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(`id`))

indices.name: idx_event_pubkey_created_id
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `idx_event_pubkey_created_id` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`pubkey` ASC, `createdAt` DESC, `id` ASC)

indices.name: idx_event_kind_created_id
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `idx_event_kind_created_id` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`kind` ASC, `createdAt` DESC, `id` ASC)

indices.name: idx_event_created_id
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `idx_event_created_id` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`createdAt` DESC, `id` ASC)

indices.name: idx_event_pubkey_kind_created_id
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `idx_event_pubkey_kind_created_id` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`pubkey` ASC, `kind` ASC, `createdAt` DESC, `id` ASC)

entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`pk` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, `pkEvent` TEXT, `position` INTEGER NOT NULL, `col0Name` TEXT, `col1Value` TEXT, `col2Differentiator` TEXT, `col3Amount` TEXT, `col4Plus` TEXT NOT NULL, `kind` INTEGER NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY(`pkEvent`) REFERENCES `EventEntity`(`id`) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE CASCADE )

indices.name: tags_by_pk_event
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `tags_by_pk_event` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`pkEvent`)

indices.name: tags_by_tags_on_person_or_events
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `tags_by_tags_on_person_or_events` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`col0Name`, `col1Value`)

indices.name: tags_by_kind_tags_on_person_or_events
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `tags_by_kind_tags_on_person_or_events` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`kind`, `col0Name`, `col1Value`, `pkEvent`)

entities.createSql: CREATE VIRTUAL TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` USING FTS4(`content` TEXT NOT NULL, content=`EventEntity`)
contentSyncTriggers: CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS room_fts_content_sync_event_fts_BEFORE_UPDATE BEFORE UPDATE ON `EventEntity` BEGIN DELETE FROM `event_fts` WHERE `docid`=OLD.`rowid`; END
CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS room_fts_content_sync_event_fts_BEFORE_DELETE BEFORE DELETE ON `EventEntity` BEGIN DELETE FROM `event_fts` WHERE `docid`=OLD.`rowid`; END
CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS room_fts_content_sync_event_fts_AFTER_UPDATE AFTER UPDATE ON `EventEntity` BEGIN INSERT INTO `event_fts`(`docid`, `content`) VALUES (NEW.`rowid`, NEW.`content`); END
CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS room_fts_content_sync_event_fts_AFTER_INSERT AFTER INSERT ON `EventEntity` BEGIN INSERT INTO `event_fts`(`docid`, `content`) VALUES (NEW.`rowid`, NEW.`content`); END

setupQueries: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS room_master_table (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,identity_hash TEXT)
INSERT OR REPLACE INTO room_master_table (id,identity_hash) VALUES(42, 'e07f59ddb60a6312edaed58d71f5fd15')
